bill.title: Health Information Confidentiality and Technology Act; provide privacy of protected health information.
bill.description: An Act To Amend Sections 41-119-1, 41-119-7 And 41-119-13, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Redesignate The "mississippi Health Information Confidentiality And Technology Act" Relating To The Privacy Of Protected Health Information Of Individuals Notwithstanding Federally Mandated Health Insurance Requirements, To Clarify That Patient Medical Record Confidentiality Standards Are The Responsibility Of The Ms-hin Board, To Provide Civil Penalties For Violation Of Patient Record Confidentiality Requirements, To Provide For A Consumer Information Website, And To Provide For Audits Of Covered Entities; And For Related Purposes.

step.action: Referred To Public Health and Welfare
